data.prayer: Spirit, help the 3,367 believers in Mubarak Al-Kabeer to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mubarak Al-Kabeer, Kuwait

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Mubarak Al-Kabeer, Kuwait.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Mubarak Al-Kabeer access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Mubarak Al-Kabeer to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Muhamasheen, Akhdam people.
Spirit, please convict the believers in Mubarak Al-Kabeer, Kuwait to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Mubarak Al-Kabeer to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Mubarak Al-Kabeer, Kuwait to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.
